statements: SELECT * FROM reports
SELECT report_id, date, impressions FROM reports WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT report_id, date, clicks FROM reports WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM reports GROUP BY campaign_id
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY date DESC, impressions DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, date, clicks FROM reports WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) as total_impressions FROM reports GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_impressions DESC
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND clicks > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(conversions) as average_conversions FROM reports WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING average_conversions > 2
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_name, total_impressions FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date, total_clicks FROM reports WHERE total_impressions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE total_clicks <= 500 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, total_impressions FROM reports WHERE total_clicks > 200 ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE total_impressions > 100 AND total_clicks < 50 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_name, total_impressions FROM reports WHERE total_clicks > 20 ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE total_impressions BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND total_clicks > 10 ORDER BY report_name ASC;
SELECT report_name, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM reports WHERE total_impressions > total_clicks AND total_clicks > 5 ORDER BY report_id;
SELECT report_name, report_date, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY total_clicks DESC,total_impressions ASC;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpi_metrics WHERE kpi_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT dashboard_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY data_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT kpi_description FROM kpi_metrics WHERE kpi_name LIKE 'Click%';
SELECT * FROM kpi_metrics ORDER BY kpi_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT data_date, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM dashboard_data WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_description FROM kpi_metrics WHERE kpi_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT dashboard_name, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM dashboard_data GROUP BY dashboard_name;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country='USA';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT report_id, campaign_id, date_generated FROM reports ORDER BY date_generated DESC;
SELECT impressions, clicks, conversions FROM performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < '2021-12-31';

SELECT reports.report_id, users.username, campaigns.campaign_name FROM reports JOIN users ON reports.user_id = users.user_id JOIN campaigns ON reports.campaign_id = campaigns.id WHERE users.country = 'USA';
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(clicks), AVG(conversions) FROM campaigns JOIN performance_metrics ON campaigns.id = performance_metrics.report_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT reports.date_generated, COUNT(*) FROM reports WHERE date_generated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY date_generated ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM mobile_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date, budget FROM mobile_marketing_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, budget FROM mobile_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(revenue) AS revenue_total FROM campaign_performance_metrics GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT u.username, a.timestamp, a.access_type FROM dashboard_users u JOIN dashboard_access_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM mobile_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, budget, status FROM mobile_marketing_campaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY budget DESC;

SELECT cm.campaign_name, cpm.impressions, cpm.clicks FROM mobile_marketing_campaigns AS cm JOIN campaign_performance_metrics AS cpm ON cm.campaign_id = cpm.campaign_id WHERE cm.campaign_type = 'social_media';
SELECT du.username, da.timestamp FROM dashboard_users AS du JOIN dashboard_access_logs AS da ON du.user_id = da.user_id WHERE da.access_type = 'login' ORDER BY da.timestamp DESC;
SELECT du.username, de.interactions FROM dashboard_users AS du JOIN user_engagement AS de ON du.user_id = de.user_id WHERE de.date = '2022-07-15';
